summary: This is an email forwarding a Victim Impact Statement for the sentencing of Ghislaine Maxwell, scheduled for June 28, 2022. The email includes attachments of the statement and photo exhibits, and contains a security warning about external senders.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded Victim Impact Statement, scheduled for sentencing on June 28, 2022.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Sentencing
events.description: Scheduled sentencing of Ghislaine Maxwell, for which a Victim Impact Statement is being submitted.

keyFacts: A Victim Impact Statement for Ghislaine Maxwell's sentencing was submitted via email on June 1, 2022.
The sentencing of Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled for June 28, 2022.
The email includes attachments of the Victim Impact Statement and photo exhibits labeled as exhibits 1 and 2.
The email contains a security warning from the NYPD about external senders, indicating it was sent to a law enforcement or government address.
The document reference EFTA00156399 suggests it is part of an official evidence or case file.
